title: Fun-Filled Escape to Coastal NSW
description: Welcome to sunny Coffs Harbour: home to a plethora of beautiful beaches, water-based activities, adventure parks and striking coastal walks. Enjoy the ultimate coastal escape staying in an apartment at Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort-located a stone’s throw from the golden shores of Charlesworth Bay Beach-and enjoy a welcome bottle of local Two Tail Wine, convenient late 12pm checkout and discounts on local experiences.

title: Fun-filled Escape in Coastal NSW
description: Welcome to sunny Coffs Harbour, home to a plethora of beautiful beaches, water-based activities, adventure parks and striking coastal walks. Enjoy the ultimate beachfront escape, staying in a self-contained apartment at Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort - located a stone’s throw from the golden shores of Charlesworth Bay Beach - and enjoy a welcome bottle of local Raleigh wine, convenient late 12pm check-out, unlimited access to the local health club and discounts on local experiences.
offer_address: 2 Resort Drive, Coffs Harbour, New South Wales 2450, Australia

title: Coffs Harbour Self-Contained Coastal Resort Stay with Direct Beach Access
description:
Experience a Coffs Harbour coastal retreat with wildlife experiences, family-friendly attractions and action-packed adventures at Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort - a beachfront haven of tranquility within Pacific Bay Resort. Set on more than 90km of uncrowded beaches, with easy access to the iconic Big Banana Fun Park and prime whale-watching coastline, Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort puts the wonders of the Coffs Coast at your fingertips.

Set among landscaped gardens, all studios and apartments are just a short stroll from the secluded Charlesworth Bay Beach, the larger, patrolled Diggers Beach - a short meander over the headland boardwalk through the sub-tropical rainforest - and resort facilities, which include three swimming pools, an outdoor spa, nine-hole golf course, four tennis courts and the beautiful Bayside Bar & Grill Restaurant.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy a daily 20% discount on buffet breakfast at Casay on the Beach
- Make the most of daily tennis racquet and ball hire
- Work up a sweat with unlimited gym access
- Sleep in with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to a One-Bedroom Apartment for up to two adults and two children (11 and under) or a Two-Bedroom Apartment for up to four adults and two children.
offer_address: 2 Resort Drive, Coffs Harbour, New South Wales 2450, Australia

title: Beachfront Stay in Coffs Harbour
description: Leave it all behind and head to sunny Coffs Harbour, staying in prime beachfront position in a spacious One Bedroom Apartment at Smugglers on the Beach. Spend three nights in this lively town on the North Coast of NSW and enjoy a complimentary bottle of wine and a guaranteed late check out.
offer_address: 36 Sandy Beach Rd, Korora, 2450 Coffs Harbour, Australia

title: Stylish Coastal Escape Only 10 Minutes from Coffs Harbour
description: The breathtaking beaches, azure waters, adventure parks and bright yellow of the Big Banana beckon when you stay at Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort, only ten-minutes from the heart of Coffs Harbour. Part of the Pacific Bay Resort, enjoy direct beachfront access to Charlesworth Bay with a three-night stay in a Deluxe Studio for two, a welcome bottle of red or white wine, unlimited access to the local health club, a lazy 12pm late checkout and a 20% discount on buffet breakfast at Casay's on the Beach. Want to bring the family along? Upgrade to the One or Two-Bedroom Apartment.
offer_address: 2 Resort Drive, Coffs Harbour, New South Wales 2450, Australia

title: Coffs Harbour Self-Contained Coastal Resort Stay with Direct Beach Access
description:
Experience a Coffs Harbour coastal retreat packed with wildlife experiences, family-friendly attractions and thrilling adventures at Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort - a beachfront haven of tranquillity within the stylish Pacific Bay Resort. Set on a 90-kilometre stretch of pristine beaches, with easy access to the iconic Big Banana Fun Park and prime whale-watching coastline, the resort puts the wonders of the Coffs Coast at your fingertips. Wander Charlesworth Bay's dazzling shoreline, take a swing at the resort's charming nine-hole golf course or find yourself in the vibrant heart of Coffs Harbour in just 10 minutes.

Set among landscaped gardens, all studios and apartments are a short stroll from resort facilities, which include three swimming pools, an outdoor spa, nine-hole golf course, four tennis courts and the beautiful Bayside Bar & Grill Restaurant. All have direct access to secluded Charlesworth Bay Beach, with the larger, patrolled Diggers Beach a short meander over the headland boardwalk through the sub-tropical rainforest.
offer_address: 2 Resort Drive, Coffs Harbour, New South Wales 2450, Australia

title: Beachside Coffs Harbour Villa Escape for up to Ten Guests with Private Pool & Direct Beach Access
description:
The breathtaking beaches, azure waters, adventure parks, striking coastal walks and bright yellow Big Banana beckon when you stay at The Richmond Beach Villa, only ten minutes from the heart of Coffs Harbour. Ideally located on Macauley's Headland, this four-bedroom beach villa is the ultimate sun-kissed oasis, complete with contemporary coastal design, a private pool and direct beach access to two of the most beautiful Coffs Coast beaches.

Whether you’re whisking the whole family away for some fun in a coastal setting or you’re taking a break with friends, this perfectly positioned escape lets you relax your way in utmost privacy.
offer_address: 31 Richmond Drive Coffs Harbour NSW 2450 Australia

title: Coffs Harbour Coastal Retreat with Direct Beach Access
description:
Surrounded by more than 90km of uncrowded beaches, with easy access to the iconic Big Banana Fun Park and prime whale-watching coastline, Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort puts the wonders of Coffs Coast at your fingertips. Only a 10-minute drive from Coffs Harbour centre and hidden away on the grounds of Pacific Bay Resort, this coastal retreat offers direct access to Charlesworth Bay Beach plus easy access to family-friendly Diggers Beach, three heated resort pools, an outdoor spa, and a challenging nine-hole golf course.

Stay in a modern Deluxe Studio and enjoy a welcome bottle of wine, unlimited gym and class access at the local health club, a leisurely 12pm checkout and 20% off buffet breakfast at nearby Casay on the Beach restaurant.

**Travelling with family or friends?** Upgrade to the One-Bedroom Apartment for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under) or the Two-Bedroom Apartment for four adults and two children (aged 11 years and under).
offer_address: 2 Resort Drive, Coffs Harbour, New South Wales 2450, Australia

title: Tropical Beachfront Coffs Harbour Escape with Three Pools, Tennis Courts & Day Spa
description:
Immerse yourself in uninterrupted coastal bliss at this relaxed, tropical-style resort, conveniently positioned on the stunning shores of Diggers Beach, Coffs Harbour. Savour the perfect blend of seaside fun and relaxation with three pools, three tennis courts and a tranquil day spa for all your pampering needs. Unwind in the elegantly appointed rooms and villas, and indulge in local cuisine at the two onsite restaurants, overlooking the beach.

You'll never be lost for activities with everything from mini golf to beach volleyball. Beyond the resort, there is also the Coffs Harbour Marina and the renowned The Big Banana Fun Park nearby - ideal for some family-friendly fun!
offer_address: 11 Firman Drive, Coffs Harbour, New South Wales, 2450, Australia
